resources.string: Pressing the %1$s will wake your device
Close after removing the last notification
Close after removing the last removable notification
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
This will enable/disable dual panel in settings (Need Reboot!)"
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Wake up device if a charger is plugged/unplugged.
Auto Hide statusbar if no non-permanent notifications are present
Auto Hide statusbar if no notifications are present
Peek at statusbar by swiping from top edge of screen
Show or change expanded desktop mode
Only navigation will be displayed at top
Change the button icon color mode
Set gravity for left and right trigger
To avoid conflicts with status bar or navigation bar, the triggers on these edges are automatically turned off if one or both are visible
Disables and reduces trigger size near keyboard when active
Mirror right pie on the horizontal axis
Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time and date information
Enable or disable second button row
Default JB with invisible icons when hidden
None (empty home longpress action will show up navring)
Reset all style entries to default?
Reset all style and dimensions entries to default?
Where do you want the menu buttons to appear?
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Navigation bar height while in portrait.
Navigation bar height while in landscape.
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side.
Shows navigation bar in lanscape on the bottom
Change the navigation bar button color mode
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Show navigation and status bar transparency
Colorize navigation and status bar background only on launcher and lockscreen
HALO will appear for incoming tasks and scroll out of sight after a while
Applies tasking or dragging to the double-tap-swipe gesture
For black/white-listing notifications pinging through HALO
Defines how big HALO is going to be
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
When opening an app with HALO the underlying app will get paused (enabled by default on low memory devices)
HALO will disappear completely when empty
Show message box for incoming notifications
HALO will ping when device is unlocked if new notifications were received
Controls whether you want floating windows from notification panel
Pulldown quick settings if no non-permanent notifications are present
Pulldown quick settings if no notifications are present
Enable Notification Light even when screen is on
Make sure you follow the steps one-by-one and complete each one before proceeding to the next.
1. Change LCD Density to stock value
Tablets and older phones use 160. Most phones use 240. Galaxy Nexus uses 320 by default.
Come back here after the reboot and complete the rest of the steps!
This step clears data from market, google play services and google services framework.
"Data couldn't be cleared, please clear it yourself!"
Come back here after the reboot and complete the rest of the steps!
Press back when done to return here.
"Couldn't open the market! If you're sure it's installed, open it yourself from the launcher."
6. Change density to whatever you like!
If you ever have compatibility issues with the market, be sure to return here and repeat the process.
"Changing your LCD density can cause unexpected app behavior. If you encounter market app incompatibility please return here and restart the process from step 1."
Values higher than %1$d are not recommended

This RAM bar shows the actual android memory (RAM) utilization. Please note that having cached apps helps your device open apps much faster. For further explanations on how android memory (RAM) management works, check the help menu.
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Open Quick Settings tiles in floating window
Display the name of the currently connected Wifi network
Use custom application instead of the recent applications dialog
Add, remove, and position items in the @ppbar
Position the Appbar on the left or right side of the screen
Display a visible tab on the side which will display the \@appbar when touched.
Display the tab on the top, middle, or bottom on the side of the screen.
Change the size of the visible tab.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Show or change Quick Settings style options
Landscape view doubles tiles per row quantity
Restore the default displayed tiles and layout?
Show the notification text around the ring.
Show all notifications including ongoing, non-clearable notifications.
Show active display notifications when you take the device out of your pocket.
Invert the colors when in areas with bright light such as direct sunlight.
Adjust level for notifications when auto brightness is disabled
Show the date above the clock
Show AM/PM indicator next to time when using 12hour format
Hide low priority notifications such as those from Google Now.
Excluded applications will not show up in active display
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Disable hints on left and right when the screen is turned on.
Warning** Some widgets are not intended to be used on the lockscreen.
Show shortcuts in the notification drawer
Change the shorcuts icon color mode
Set to right side of screen
Change the order of PIN pad numbers
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Show notification if privacy guard is active.

In this screen you can choose for which apps Privacy Guard should be active by simply tapping on them. Selected apps will not be able to access your personal data, such as contacts, messages, location or call logs. Long pressing on an entry allows to set specifically app permissions.\n\nBy default built-in apps are not shown. If you want to show them or filter apps to show only the ones requesting access to personal data by their permissions, select the respective options in the menu.
Selected app does not request permissions which access personal data. Do you want to modify the other permissions?
Reset all permissions back to default?
This app has no changeable permissions.
Reset network stats color to default?
Hide when there is no traffic
Hide network stats indicator when there is no traffic
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
